definition: lost/missing/forsaken/dissolute/(of a woman) beautiful/fault/offense/hermit/variant of 逸[yi4]
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: This system has been successfully operated in Guizhou Yi-Ming Information Technology Limited Company.
sentences.chinese: 該系統已經在貴州佚名信息技術有限公司成功運行。

sentences.english: He who realizes his shortcomings is getting closer to spiritual ripeness.
sentences.chinese: 佚名意識到自己的缺點就是正在接近思想的成熟。

sentences.english: We name the author of the works for which we don't know the author "Yiminshi".
sentences.chinese: 不知道作者的作品一般都被稱爲佚名氏的作品。

definition: interpreting words/to explain the meaning of words in classic texts/to decipher an old script
vertical scroll (painting or calligraphy)/vertical shaft (of a machine)
to inscribe a poem (often, composed on the spot) on a painting, fan or ceramic bowl etc as a work of calligraphy/an inscribed poem
abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
understanding and enjoying (a work of art)
vertical scroll (painting or calligraphy)/vertical shaft (of a machine)
